TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CameraCharacteristics extends Android.Hardware.Camera2.CameraMetadata

Docs.summary: The properties describing a CameraDevice CameraDevice.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.
To be added.
Returns the list of keys supported by this CameraDevice for querying with a CaptureRequest.
Docs.value: List of keys supported by this CameraDevice for CaptureRequests.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the list of keys supported by this CameraDevice for querying with a CaptureResult.
Docs.value: List of keys supported by this CameraDevice for CaptureResults.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns a subset of #getAvailableCaptureRequestKeys keys that can be overridden for physical devices backing a logical multi-camera.
Docs.value: List of keys that can be overridden in individual physical device requests. In case the camera device doesn't support such keys the list can be null.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns a subset of #getAvailableCaptureRequestKeys keys that the camera device can pass as part of the capture session initialization.
Docs.value: List of keys that can be passed during capture session initialization. In case the camera device doesn't support such keys the list can be null.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.RecommendedStreamConfigurationMap GetRecommendedStreamConfigurationMap(valuetype Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode usecase) cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieve camera device recommended stream configuration map RecommendedStreamConfigurationMap for a given use case.
Docs.returns: Valid RecommendedStreamConfigurationMap or null in case the camera device doesn't have any recommendation for this use case or the recommended configurations are invalid.
